body.name: BritMo Led Cordless Desk Lamp, Rechargeable 3500mAh Battery Operated Reading lamp with Eye-Caring, Stepless Dimming Brightness, 3 Color Temperatures, Auto Timer Table Lamp for Office Bedroom (White)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 20 hrs 9 mins
features: ✔️【3500mAh Large Capacity Battery】: BritMo rechargeable desk lamps is the only one on the market with 3500mAh super power storage battery. The LED desk lamp requires only 5 hours of charging and can work from 6 hours to 100 hours, depending on the brightness level. And the inside of the lamp is equipped with aluminum alloy heat sink and overheat protection device to protect your safety. Desk lamps work 40 times longer than typical incandescent lamps.

✔️【Stepless Dimming Brightness Levels】BritMo Mo desk lamp intuitively sets brightness levels (from 10%-100%) with a responsive touch power button. The desk lamp instantly provides comfortable center lighting in bedrooms, offices, kitchens and other areas with a soft light. The BritMo rechargeable desk lamp has a center illuminance of about 750 and is a good choice for your desk to supplement the light source.

✔️【Eye-Caring LED Sensor Lamp】Stepless dimming and color (between 2700 K and 6500 K) with touch control, choose the brightness and light color temperature that suits you. The desk lamp is equipped with 42 full-spectrum lamp beads, with soft light, no flickering, no shadows, effectively avoiding eye fatigue caused by flickering light and dazzling glare, ideal for reading, studying, working and camping.

✔️【Flexible and Portable Study Lamp】With 360°flexibility gooseneck, the natural desk table light allows you to light up where you needed. The LED desk light also can be folded into a small lamp box so that it don’t take up too much space when traveling or camping.

✔️【Minimalist design】The minimalist design of the BritMo cordless desk lamp is suitable for any work or study situation.The modern design desk lamp adopts professional optical structure and high-quality led components to ensure eye-friendly, suitable for reading or relaxing. A great gift for students and friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome portable lamp with great controls
reviews.reviewText: I purchased a little Epson laser projector (Ef-12) a couple of years ago and now I can now watch the 150 inch image in my bedroom before going to sleep at the end of the day. One thing that is necessary for decent image quality on this relatively low lumen projector, is good light control. With some high quality curtains, I now have exceptional light control and the image on my bedroom wall is stunning. Sometimes I like to do some work from the little bed/work table I have set up beside me. I needed a portable lamp to add a bit of light without disturbing the image on the big screen. This cordless lamp has been a fantastic solution for this task. I am a stickler for warm color temperature and good dimming control. The lamp provides the right amount of warm light without the blue color that can make it hard to fall asleep near the end of my day. The battery seems to last me days and I use a portable power bank to top it off when it needs a charge. I wish it had a more standard usb-c connector, but the battery life, features and price make this an exceptional buy. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: While purchasing it I didn’t notice how many lumen it has. Absolutely best fit for my desk. It covers my whole reading area and the brightness is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing table lamp!
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect USB charging table/desk lamp. It’s sleek, great looking and stylish. Multiple light colors with multiple light intensities. We use it at the dining room table late at night. When we have a smoke sesh, it’s very nice to have subtle lighting. We don’t want ceiling lights on over our heads. We wanted a soft light LED battery operated lamp to light up our round table with friends and family. It’s a tall table lamp, the exact size we were looking for.We are so happy with our purchase. The battery has a long life and we will get plenty of use out of it. We highly recommend buying!You won’t regret it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars UPDATED 1/18/24: Great light source
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE 1/18/24. WHERE THE LAMP BENDS ON THE POLE MIDWAY, IT IS STARTING TO BEND BY ITSELF. THE LIGHTS STILL WORK, IT AGAIN JUST BENDS BY ITSELF. VERY DISAPPOINTING.....,........,..........,FURST REVIEW WHEN PURCHASED: Love this lamp. It's portable, dimmable and charge lasts a decent amount of time. I take it everywhere in my home. I take it for the night stand to read at night. It is very flexible. The only issue I have, though it hasn't happened yet, is where it bends, it will eventually start to bend on its own and no longer be any good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I received this lamp and absolutely loved it but it has stopped working and will not charge up anymore. The total bummer is I’m just outside my return window.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brite, Portable, Chordless
reviews.reviewText: Nice lamp for my work desk. I have two monitors about 5-ft desk space. The lamp is fine; the brightness is very good and not soft (as some incandescent bulbs) . I like the goose-neck flexibility and the cordless feature is awesome - I have adequate battery life, but I never tested the duration as I use about 2-3 hrs per charge and never ran out. The Bulb is about 5-inches, which casts adequate light for my workspace, but it would be nice if it had a wider cast and a taller stance (about 15-inch).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars works well, simple and nicely understated
reviews.reviewText: I just bought my second one which itself tells you how I feel about it. I like the flexibility of the neck, the smallish size of the lamp, and the easy delicate touch of its on/off control. I do wish it put out more light though.
